Articles.Content:
I didnt really want to post this on either cBBp's or Bobcat's threads so as not to step on anyone's toes accidentally.

Can anyone give me the value i must scale the Kosmos parts by if I wish to reconcile them with Bobcat's (and a goodly number of other people's) 64% rule

Thanks!

Also in this thread: Who doesnt use the 64% rule, aside from Kosmos?

Edited June 21, 2013 by Budgie

I don't know exactly, but trial and error should get you there faster than forum replies. I can't be of much help at the moment because I'm at work.

Does Bobcat create his parts 64% to scale, or does he rescaleFactor to 64%?
A quick look into one of his cfg files claims a rescaleFactor of 1, so he clearly models his parts pre-scaled
